channel.title: Adding repeating spawning items
channel.description: I have a project czar server. I wanna add an area where runes will continue to spawn on the ground, so people don't have to spent loads of time buying from magic store. I changed the "smith" command in emote tab, to "runes" in client.java but its still says "smith". But I did get it to tele to place where I want it to. I also want to know how to add REPEATING spawning items. (ex. 1000 runes appear in one spot per 30 seconds) PLEASE HELP!!!!!! :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 12:21:22 PM[/size][hr]help plz!

item.title: Adding repeating spawning items
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

In your server folder. Open up Itemspawnpoints.java

This is the code to add new items and where they spawn.

ItemHandler.addItem(ITEMID, XCOORDINATE, YCOORDINATE, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // PICKAXE spawntimer = TIMEFORSPAWN;

Read full topic

item.title: Adding repeating spawning items
item.dc:creator: @wiz1166 wiz1166
item.description:
@wiz1166 wrote:

ok goto www.runelocus.com and look at the nava bar and there should be somthing that says tools and there will be Autospawn Creator and then click on it add the info like where you want it to be at and all kinds of other crap and then when your done filling that out then click creat then it gives you the codes. i hoped that helped! and if you need help on the part to where to add the codes pm me :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 12:32:24 PM[/size][hr]o ya and the part of the emote trouble to change the text on the emote tob goto text handler in java file and then press ctrl f and then for the search put in smith and then when you find if change it to runes if thats the what you want it to say. and how to change where it tele’s to go in client in java file and search for the command you want edited and then when you find it you have to change x and y tele cordnates and then when you done save it and compile it and then re-run your server then if should work i hoped that helped!

Read full topic
